audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Clear functional optimization - RPA automation of back-office tasks is a classic efficiency improvement pattern. Replicable across organizations with similar manual processes.

tier_verification: Most claims are correctly classified as tier 1 functional optimizations. However, C7 appears to be misclassified - it describes new revenue stream creation ($1B advertising platform) which is tier 1 business model innovation, not tier 1 process optimization.
